### tor: Import Multiple Files From a Single Directory at Once

2019 - present  
URL <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/fgeo.x/index.html>

The goal of fgeo.x is to help you access small example datasets from Luquillo, a ForestGEO site in Puerto Rico (<https://forestgeo.si.edu/sites/north-america/luquillo>).

2019-01 - present  
URL <https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tor>  

The goal of tor (to-R) is to help you to import multiple files from a single directory at once, and to do so as quickly, flexibly, and simply as possible.

### fgeo: Analyze Forest Diversity and Dynamics

2017-03 - present  
URL <https://forestgeo.github.io/fgeo/>  

'fgeo' is a collection of R packages to analyze forest diversity and dynamics. It includes packages to manipulate and plot ForestGEO data, and to do common analyses including abundance, demography, and species-habitats associations.
